煃字的基本解释

煃
kuǐ
火貌。

煃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuǐ］
［《集韻》犬繠切，上紙，溪。］
火貌。见《玉篇·火部》。亦作人名用字。元有陈日煃。见陈衍《元诗纪事·陈日煃》。明有朱秩煃。见《明史·庆王传》。

煃字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　煃； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页675第23
【集韻】犬橤切，音跬。【玉篇】火貌。

煃字的起名意思

火貌。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuǐ]
["Ji Yun" cut the dog, put on paper, stream. ]
Fire appearance. See "Jade Chapter·Fire Department". Also used as a name for a person. Yuan has Chen Rixuan. See Chen Yan's "Yuanshi Chronicle·Chen Rixuan". There is Zhu Zhixuan in Ming Dynasty. See "The History of the Ming Dynasty·The Biography of the King of Qing Dynasty".
blazing

【Ji Yun】Kunrui cut, the sound is lame. [Jade articles] Fire appearance.
